item.description:
Vale D. is hosting this fine event

 

Westin Waltham Hotel Afterwork Cocktail Party

October 10, 2012 6 PM- 9 PM

The popular Westin Waltham Hotel is where we will gather for our October 10th Afterwork Cocktail Party.

Look for the friendly, professional crowd in the large and comfortable lounge, located just beyond the hotel’s main entrance

Musician and Boston award winning singer/songwriter, Bill Byron, will entertain us with the gift of his piano music. (http://songramp.comBillyByron)

Enjoy the beautiful view of the reservoir while mixing and mingling. Light appetizers served compliments of the Sitzundjibers members. Parking is free in the convenient parking garage.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be hard to miss
item.name: Enjoy drinks appetizers & conversations as you watch the commuters on RT 95
